author: IBM Technology
description:
Understand why we should assume systems are already breached and learn strategies to redefine security boundaries, and how organizations must design systems with the intruder already inside. Watch the full episode to learn more!

#zerotrust #databreach #security
title: Today's State of Zero Trust Security
